name: Shade (Rafiki)
description:
Supports both keyboard an controller:

Controller:  Left joystick to move, A to interact with objects (as Elliot), RB to switch characters, A to jump (as Shade)

Keyboard: Arrows / WASD to move, space to interact with objects (as Elliot), Tab to switch characters, space to jump (as Shade)

If you're stuck, press L (keyboard) to restard the level.

Final project of the Dawson Game Design program. 

@ankylosaurus made the art.
